Zero moved slightly to the right, barrymores blasts hitting his 
wings, scorching them slightly. As he pass by her he unleashed 
another matrix energy blast at her which moved him farther away from 
her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> BARRYMORE
> 
>

burnt her side. She moves backwards the get out of the reach of the 
beam. She see's Zero flying towards her and raises her rifle. She 
fires 5 laser beams at Zero's face...)
